sampler¶

class sampler.PlotSampler(cloud)¶

Handles and creates information from a CloudInfo object for sampling. Requres a CloudInfo object.

clip_plots()¶

Creates a set of clipped las files based on the input plot shapefile.

df_sort(plot_set)¶

Takes all of the unique vertices and makes a new dataframe

export_grid(path, verts=False)¶

Creates a grid shapefile from the cloud grid_constructor function.

extract_plot(square_df, plot_index)¶

converts dataframe points to something

extract_points()¶

Returns a list of plot coordinate tuples (len = plots)

get_geom(path)¶

Reads a shapefile and returns a list of Wkt geometries.

Keyword arguments: path – Input path of a shapefile.

intersect_plots()¶

Exports a list of JSON coordinates of cell vertices near the plot location. Used to clip a square around the plots within a las file.
